0:
mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: "${DT_MQTT_USERNAME}"
  password: "${DT_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - amcrest-frontyard
    - amcrest-pool
    - amcrest-turret
    - amcrest-office

  zones:
    - camera: amcrest-frontyard
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-pool
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-turret
      zone: familyroom
    - camera: amcrest-office
      zone: office

  events:

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"
  compreface:
    enabled: false

time:
  timezone: America/New_York

notify:

/hr/prometheus-community.github.io-helm-.title: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac helm release
/hr/prometheus-community.github.io-helm-.name: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac
/hr/prometheus-community.github.io-helm-.doc:
To monitor Dell iDRAC devices with Prometheus, you can use the SNMP Exporter and use it with the snmp.yml configuration file.

Below you can find other users from our community that have already configured the SNMP Exporter for Dell iDRAC devices. Click on their repository links to see their helm release and in the same directory you should find a config map with the snmp.yml configuration file.

0: 🤘 Jammin' with the 💻 console 🤠 cowboys in 🌐 cyberspace

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit

upstream:
  default:
    - tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDR}
customDNS:
  mapping:
    ${SECRET_DOMAIN}: ${METALLB_INGRESS_ADDR}
blocking:
  blackLists:
    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ookangzheng/dbl-oisd-nl/master/dbl.txt
      - |
        /^ad([sxv]?[0-9]*|system)[_.-]([^.[:space:]]+\.){1,}|[_.-]ad([sxv]?[0-9]*|system)[_.-]/
        /^(.+[_.-])?adse?rv(er?|ice)?s?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^(.+[_.-])?telemetry[_.-]/
        /^adim(age|g)s?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^adtrack(er|ing)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^advert(s|is(ing|ements?))?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^aff(iliat(es?|ion))?[_.-]/
        /^analytics?[_.-]/
        /^banners?[_.-]/
        /^beacons?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^count(ers?)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^mads\./
        /^pixels?[-.]/
        /^stat(s|istics)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
  whiteLists:
    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/whitelist/master/domains/whitelist.txt
  clientGroupsBlock:
    default:
      - ads
clientLookup:
  upstream: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDR}
prometheus:
  enable: true
  path: /metrics
bootstrapDns: tcp:1.1.1.1
httpPort: 4000
logFormat: json
logLevel: info
